answers.answer: I am exactly 32 weeks today and I feel the same way...although I feel very tired as well but that I need to get things done. Unfortunately I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes last friday and now I have to prick my fingers for next 2 months...hopefully onyl next 2 months..if the condition goes away after my son is born.

Ohhhh yes! 32 weeks this Wednesday and I've gotten nearly the entire house organized! I did the last load of baby's clothes today! I want to prepare hospital bags, but I'm running out of things to occupy my time with LOL!

Lol gotta love those nesting instincts, mine have been so bad that every other day I'm changing my 2yr olds bed sheets as well as my own and vacuuming almost 24/7... I like things to be clean but its almost driving me crazy lol

question: A couple of days shy of 32 weeks (woohoo 8 months !) and I'm feeling a sudden urgency to start washing all our baby's clothes and pack mine (and my fiances) and the babys hospital bags, so I'm guessing that's what's on the agenda today! Wanted to wait a little longer but the feeling to do it now is so extreme I'm taking it as a sign :) plus I'm hoping to work right up till bub is here so I won't have any time pretty much after now to do everything! Soo excited to organise the nursery finally. Any other mommies feeling like this?
title: Preparation for little one!
